driveInclusionRules.description: The list of drive inclusion rules applied to the tenant.

driveProtectionUnits.description: The list of drive protection units in the tenant.

exchangeProtectionPolicies.description: The list of Exchange protection policies in the tenant.

exchangeRestoreSessions.description: The list of Exchange restore sessions available in the tenant.

mailboxInclusionRules.description: The list of mailbox inclusion rules applied to the tenant.

mailboxProtectionUnits.description: The list of mailbox protection units in the tenant.

oneDriveForBusinessProtectionPolicies.description: The list of OneDrive for Business protection policies in the tenant.

oneDriveForBusinessRestoreSessions.description: The list of OneDrive for Business restore sessions available in the tenant.

protectionPolicies.description: List of protection policies in the tenant.

protectionUnits.description: List of protection units in the tenant.

restorePoints.description: List of restore points in the tenant.

restoreSessions.description: List of restore sessions in the tenant.

serviceApps.description: List of Backup Storage apps in the tenant.

sharePointProtectionPolicies.description: The list of SharePoint protection policies in the tenant.

sharePointRestoreSessions.description: The list of SharePoint restore sessions available in the tenant.

siteInclusionRules.description: The list of site inclusion rules applied to the tenant.

siteProtectionUnits.description: The list of site protection units in the tenant.

driveExpression.description: Contains a drive expression. For examples, see driveExpression examples.

displayName.description: Display name of the directory object.

email.description: Email associated with the directory object.

mailboxInclusionRules.description: The rules associated with the Exchange protection policy.

mailboxProtectionUnits.description: The protection units (mailboxes) that are  protected under the Exchange protection policy.

mailboxExpression.description: Contains a mailbox expression. For examples, see mailboxExpression examples.

directoryObjectId.description: The ID of the directory object.

displayName.description: Display name of the directory object.

email.description: Email address associated with the directory object.

mailboxRestoreArtifacts.description: A collection of restore points and destination details that can be used to restore Exchange mailboxes.

expirationDateTime.description: Expiration date time of the restore point.

protectionDateTime.description: Date time when the restore point was created.

restoredFolderId.description: The new restored folder identifier for the user.

driveInclusionRules.description: Contains the details of the Onedrive for Business protection rule.

driveProtectionUnits.description: Contains the protection units associated with a  OneDrive for Business protection policy.

driveRestoreArtifacts.description: A collection of restore points and destination details that can be used to restore a OneDrive for Business drive.

restoredSiteId.description: The new site identifier if destinationType is new, and the input site ID if the destinationType is inPlace.

restoredSiteName.description: The name of the restored site.

restoredSiteWebUrl.description: The web URL of the restored site.

createdDateTime.description: The time of creation of the policy.

displayName.description: The name of the policy to be created.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The timestamp of the last modification of the policy.

retentionSettings.description: Contains the retention setting details for the policy.

createdDateTime.description: The time of creation of the protection unit.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Timestamp of the last modification of this protection unit.

policyId.description: The unique identifier of the protection policy based on which protection unit was created.

completedDateTime.description: The time of completion of the restore session.

createdDateTime.description: The time of creation of the restore session.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the restore session.

effectiveDateTime.description: Timestamp of the effective activation of the service app.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity.

registrationDateTime.description: Timestamp of the creation of the service app entity.

siteInclusionRules.description: The rules associated with the SharePoint Protection policy.

siteProtectionUnits.description: The protection units (sites) that are protected under the site protection policy.

siteExpression.description: Contains a site expression. For examples, see siteExpression example.

siteId.description: Unique identifier of the SharePoint site.

siteWebUrl.description: The web URL of the SharePoint site.

siteRestoreArtifacts.description: A collection of restore points and destination details that can be used to restore SharePoint sites.

restoredSiteId.description: The new site identifier if the value of the destinationType property is new, and the existing site ID if the value is inPlace.

restoredSiteName.description: The name of the restored site.

restoredSiteWebUrl.description: The web URL of the restored site.

id.description: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.

gracePeriodDateTime.description: The expiration time of the grace period.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity.

restoreAllowedTillDateTime.description: The expiration time of the restoration allowed period.

createdDateTime.description: The time of creation of the rule.

isAutoApplyEnabled.description: Indicates whether the protection rule is static or dynamic.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: Timestamp of the last modification made to the rule.

completionDateTime.description: The time when restoration of restore artifact is completed.

startDateTime.description: The time when restoration of restore artifact is started.

period.description: The period of time to retain the protected data for a single Microsoft 365 service.

message.description: A non-localized message for the developer.

displayName.description: The display name of the identity.For drive items, the display name might not always be available or up to date. For example, if a user changes their display name the API might show the new value in a future response, but the items associated with the user don't show up as changed when using delta.

id.description: Unique identifier for the identity or actor. For example, in the access reviews decisions API, this property might record the id of the principal, that is, the group, user, or application that's subject to review.

microsoft.graph.ODataErrors.InnerError.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items
